recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of chicken breasts| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of onion, chopped| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 960; Measure out 960 grams of chicken broth| Measurement; 400; Measure out 400 grams of tomatoes, diced| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of green chiles, chopped| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of corn kernels| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of black beans, drained and rinsed| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of cumin| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of chili powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of tortilla chips, crushed| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of cheddar cheese, shredded| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of avocado, diced| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of cilantro, chopped| Untimed; None; Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat| Untimed; None; Add onion and garlic to the pot and cook until softened| Untimed; None; Add chicken broth, tomatoes, green chiles, corn, black beans, cumin, chili powder, salt, and black pepper to the pot| Untimed; None; Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer| Timed; 2400; Simmer for 40 minutes| Untimed; None; Remove chicken breasts from the pot, shred, and return to the pot| Untimed; None; Serve soup topped with crushed tortilla chips, cheddar cheese, avocado, and cilantro| Finish; None; Enjoy!
title: Chicken Tortilla Soup IV
